targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
  toInt16(status/100)*100 as status,
  count() /(60000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1727927116) AND date <= toDateTime(1727948716)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Requests Per Second By Status Group

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  hostname,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND ic_request_type != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  hostname
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 30) * 30) * 1000 as t,
  hostname,
  count() /(30000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1710149700) AND date <= toDateTime(1710160500)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND ic_request_type != ''
GROUP BY
  t,
  hostname
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  status,
  count() /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
  status,
  count() /(60000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    ic_canister_id
  FROM
    $table
  WHERE
    date >= ($__to - ($__to - $__from)/2)/1000 - 900
    AND date <= ($__to + ($__to - $__from)/2)/1000 + 900
    AND env = '${env}'
    AND ic_canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    ic_canister_id
  ORDER BY
    countMerge(request_count) DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  ic_canister_id,
  countMerge(request_count) /($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND ic_canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT ic_canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_canister_id
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
WITH busy_canisters AS (
  SELECT
    ic_canister_id
  FROM
    default.http_access_by_canister
  WHERE
    date >= (1710168304544 - (1710168304544 - 1710157504544)/2)/1000 - 900
    AND date <= (1710168304544 + (1710168304544 - 1710157504544)/2)/1000 + 900
    AND env = 'prod'
    AND ic_canister_id != ''
  GROUP BY
    ic_canister_id
  ORDER BY
    countMerge(request_count) DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 30) * 30) * 1000 as t,
  ic_canister_id,
  countMerge(request_count) /(30000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access_by_canister
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1710158005) AND date <= toDateTime(1710168805)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND ic_canister_id GLOBAL IN (SELECT ic_canister_id FROM busy_canisters)
GROUP BY
  t,
  ic_canister_id
ORDER BY t

panels.title: Requests Per Second By Canister ID (top10 over last 30min)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  $timeSeries as t,
  if(cache_status == '', 'UNKNOWN', cache_status) as cache_status,
  count() / ($__interval_ms / 1000)
FROM
  $table
WHERE
  $timeFilter
  AND env = '${env}'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  cache_status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t,
  if(cache_status == '', 'UNKNOWN', cache_status) as cache_status,
  count() / (60000 / 1000)
FROM
  default.http_access
WHERE
  date >= toDateTime(1726803002) AND date <= toDateTime(1726824602)
  AND env = 'prod'
  AND status > 0
GROUP BY
  t,
  cache_status
ORDER BY t
